user.title: Configure PSKReporter HA Bridge
user.description:
Monitor amateur radio digital mode propagation from PSKReporter.info.

**Personal Monitor:** Enter your callsign to track your spots.
**Global Monitor:** Leave callsign empty to monitor network-wide activity.

data_description.callsign: Your amateur radio callsign (e.g., W1AW). Leave empty for global monitor.
data_description.direction: Choose whether to monitor received spots, transmitted spots, or both

error.invalid_callsign: Invalid callsign format. Please enter a valid amateur radio callsign.

abort.already_configured: This callsign and direction combination is already configured

data_description.count_only: Only count spots without storing details (reduces memory usage)
data_description.sample_rate: Process 1 in N messages (higher = less CPU, 1 = all messages)
data_description.min_distance: Only show spots beyond this distance (0 = no minimum)
data_description.max_distance: Only show spots within this distance (0 = no maximum)
data_description.mode_filter: Only show spots using these modes (empty = all modes)
